code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuestionLabel=_ref=>{let{title,description}=_ref;const[isOpen,setOpen]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"questions__block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:isOpen?"questions__text questions__text--active":"questions__text",onClick:()=>setOpen(status=>!status),children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isOpen?"questions__description--active questions__description":"questions__description",children:description})]});};export default QuestionLabel;
